```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

# Register an inline hook:
knitr::knit_hooks$set(inline = function(x) {
  x <- sprintf("%1.3f", x)
  paste(x, collapse = ", ")
})

```
